title: Global economic integration and cost decreases

content.prompt: Which of the following was the most immediate cause of global economic integration in the late twentieth and early twenty-first century?

choices.label: Increased dependence on cheap oil from the middle east
Decreases in the cost of long-distance communication and transportation
Regulation of air and water pollution in the developed world
